definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Antlers are the hard and bony points that grow on the heads of male deer.
sentences.chinese: 鹿角就是長在公鹿頭上的角。

sentences.english: A buck was browsing on the meadow.
sentences.chinese: 一隻公鹿正在草地上喫草。

sentences.english: Male deer usually have horns on their heads.
In the afternoon, they go back out, hoping for that buck. They wait and wait.
sentences.chinese: 一天下午，他們倆回到小木屋，期望着公鹿的到來。

sentences.english: On the summit of the tympanum two stags stand on each side of a cross.
sentences.chinese: 這區塊頂端有兩隻公鹿站立在十字架旁。

sentences.english: The young buck was a little embarrassed, but he did not see it as any kind of warning.
sentences.chinese: 公鹿有點尷尬，但是不覺得這是某種預兆。

sentences.english: Male deer use their antlers in Bradgate Park near Leicester, England.
sentences.chinese: 英國萊斯特市，兩隻公鹿正在頂角。

sentences.english: So, thinking to save her own life, she let the buck go first.
sentences.chinese: 於是，爲了保護自己的生命，她讓公鹿走在前頭。

sentences.english: Well, that deer walked right up to where I was sitting.
sentences.chinese: 這頭公鹿一直走到我坐的地方。

definition: the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
